meanings.definition: The part of a golf club that strikes the ball.
meanings.sent1: The clubheads of the golf clubs were shiny and clean.
meanings.sent2: He carefully inspected the clubheads before teeing off.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the clubheads for acorns and tried to bury them.
meanings.sent4: Her precision with the clubheads was like a surgeon's skill with a scalpel.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the clubheads hitting the golf balls echoed across the course.

meanings.definition: A group of people who meet regularly for a shared interest or activity.
meanings.sent1: The book clubheads gathered every Thursday to discuss their latest read.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed being part of the clubheads that focused on hiking adventures.
meanings.sent3: The clubheads decided to have a picnic in the park for their next meeting.
meanings.sent4: Their bond as clubheads was as strong as family ties.
meanings.sent5: The clubheads cheered together at the local sports game, united in their support.
